body: Bruh author too far. The poor nun doesn’t deserve this shit.

Hold on, the last story is translated in a way that it's unclear. Did the father betray her by setting her up to become a prostitute with a lie about debt? doesn't seem that way since they imply  that the father doesn't know. However, the idol  says she heard from her father and that he told her about the debt. Which is it? did the father know or didn't he? I normally don't complain about cough free translations cough but the entire story hinges on this one point and they completely fucked it up.
To Ichigo the ntr cucks are just way to relatable. He can't help it
